pr_title: DHFPROD-4888: Add entity type title as collection to mapped documents

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4888: Add entity type title as collection to mapped documents

timeline.bodyText: Shouldnt the default collection be both entityType title and stepName to be consistent with pre 5.3?
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: "default-mapping" is technically the step definition name, though I don't think it has any meaning other than to be a sensible default for a collection for mapped documents. If the entityType is used as the sensible default, then I don't see any reason nor meaning in the step definition name being used as a default collection too.
replies.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: I was looking for "TestCustomerMapping" and agree that "default-mapping" shouldnt be used as a default collection.
replies.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: @bsrikan added the step name to the default collections.
replies.author: ryanjdew
